constraints.name: ascii_range_constraint
constraints.description: 字符串中的字符必须是ASCII码32到126之间的可打印字符
constraints.formal: 32 <= ASCII(c) <= 126 for all c in s

constraints.name: no_leading_trailing_spaces
constraints.description: 字符串不能以空格开头或结尾

constraints.name: case_transformation
constraints.description: 第六行的所有小写字母必须转换为大写字母，其他字符保持不变
constraints.formal: s[5][i] = uppercase(s[5][i]) if s[5][i] is lowercase, otherwise s[5][i] remains unchanged
